INSTALL
-------
1. Choose $ENV_HOME
2. Unzip dist_env*.zip into $ENV_HOME
3. Copy the etc/env.prop_orig to etc/env.prop
4. Edit the properties file.
5. Configure the shell environment by setting 
   $ENV_HOME and $ENV_FILE ($ENV_HOME/etc/env.prop)

UPDATE
------
Same as install, make sure to review env.prop_orig for new settings
that may not be in your env.prop.
